extendedInfo.description: Uninstall all your old and slow League of Legends applications, you wonât need them anymore, The Memento is all you need!You need help choosing the champion you will love to play and who will make your opponents fear you?You need a tool that helps you remember when the jungle monsters are up or what items are best suited for your favorite champion? You want to try the champions of the week and check if they are worth the money?You need to quickly get up to date builds from your favorite websites directly on your smartphone or your tablet, avoiding the classic ALT+TAB?There is something for every type of player in the Memento, the only all-in-one League of Legends application:- Adapted for all devices: smartphones and tablets- All champions information     o Recommended items     o Tips     o Opponents Tips     o Video     o Statistics     o Skins     o Counter picks (from www.championselect.net)     o Detailed abilities with video     o Story- All items information- Full Masteries, Runes, Spells databases- Builds from your favorites websites:     o A complete reader with all the build information     o Mobafire     o Solomid     o LoLPro- Jungle Timers      o 5vs5 and 3vs3 modes     o Custom timers (flash, wards...)     o Vibrator or sound at the end of the timers     o Notifications warning you even when the application is in background- Widget that displays the Free Champion Rotation (to use the widget, the application must be installed on the device internal storage, not the SD card)- Servers status- Up to date data:     o Update your Game data when you want ! No boring download at application start, YOU decide when you have the time to update your League of Legends data.     o Thanks to our engine, the data is updated right after Riotâs update. Whenever an update is released, it will be in the Memento.- Game data available in all League of Legends supported languages.- Elaborated Design and Ergonomy.Feel free to contact us by mail if you have any suggestions.You can help us translate the app in your language. The website Crowdin is really easy and fast to use, so don't hesitate to contribute!http://crowdin.net/project/lol-mementoLeague Of Legends Â© Riot Games Inc. All right reserved.League of Legends and Riot Games Inc. are trademarks or registered trademarks of Riot Games Inc.

reviews.title: New to LoL
reviews.comment: Quick helpful guides. Easy to use and kept upto date. Keep up the good work
reviews.author: xYxTHUNDER

reviews.title: Skin wallpapers!!
reviews.comment: I use nexus 7 and when I try to use the skins as wallpapers the image is to big for the screen :(  plz fix it                                        other than that I love it And it\'s still worth 5 stars :D
reviews.author: Adam Price

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Only thing I can\'t complain about is that some builds don\'t show up from moba compared to desktop browsing
reviews.author: Anthony Sutton

reviews.title: Adware leadbolt network.
reviews.comment: Does nobody else scan apps? Seriously look it up! This can potentially leak personal data giving access to spam txts and or calls. I will keep looking thanks.
reviews.author: Matthew Reimer

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Great app, gives a lot of info. Anyone interested in some ranked duo NA add: 3xr3m3 sk1ll (bronze 2) I main Mid and ADC so support main would be great and I don\'t care what elo
reviews.author: christian anderson

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: but i cant seen to ooen tristina when ever i open it,it say Lol memoto has stop working :(
reviews.author: Teo Weikang

reviews.title: lol memento op plz nerf
reviews.comment: This app is amazing helps win a lot of games when playing with my noob friends, I Don t have to tell them what to build anymore. Keep the good work up, thanks so much
reviews.author: Marc Huggins

reviews.title: Best Ever
reviews.comment: I love this app. I have installed many LOL apps and this is the best by far. Always up to date which is amazing and has very easy navigation through the app. A MUST HAVE!!!!!!
reviews.author: Gabriel Munoz

reviews.title: Great lol app
reviews.comment: I wish that they would also have summoner spell cool down timers but other than that this app has everything
reviews.author: tyler johnston

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Works great so far. Gives detailed info and UI friendly.
reviews.author: Nitro Fizzle

reviews.title: Issue
reviews.comment: The only problem this seems to have is the hangup when downloading the weekly update.  Often if not always the only cure is to restart your phone.
reviews.author: Justin Haslam

reviews.title: Pretty good!
reviews.comment: Almost everything works great. Only issue I keep having is attempting to view the web view of champ builds; the app immediately jumps back to the build selection screen when this happens. Aside from this bug, the only other thing I\'d like to see is some sort of builder that let\'s you create builds on the fly. If they add that feature, I\'d upgrade for sure.
reviews.author: Christopher Yunker

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It literally has everything. And is completely updated.
reviews.author: Gabriel Manfroi

reviews.title: Brand\'s classic
reviews.comment: Is still his old one.
reviews.author: Mario Uranga

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: I love this apparently its always up to date and has every thing u need to help with LOL like jungle timers, champion builds, skins and everything else I recommend this apparently for every league of legends player and keep up the good work
reviews.author: Frederick Odiase

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Only thing I would like is the ability to chat in LoL using the app. Like the LoL Chat app on iOS. Because currently I have to use a separate app.
reviews.author: Alex K

reviews.title: Really good app!
reviews.comment: Its a great app for recent players and it helps you for reading out things that are useful in the game :D But here are some things to better up a bit: Some Skins cant be viewed in the ingame graphics and a calculater in which you choose items and can save them + masteries in several presets would be nice :DD
reviews.author: Leander Wons

reviews.title: Exelent
reviews.comment: The best allround lol app.
reviews.author: Kristoffer Hjelm

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Every information is in it: Champions, abilities, patch notes, sale, and there\'s a really cool feature which is the timer for monsters in the jungle, you can use it during a match and keep time of the buffs, baron, drag, really useful... 5 stars!  One problem though, the thing about the server status is not working, it always shows that all servers are offline.. Doesn\'t really make a difference to me but that\'s something you could fix on the next update..
reviews.author: Rodrigo M

reviews.title: Hit the nail right on the head!
reviews.comment: This is everything it claimed to be and more. Just keep it current and don\'t change anything. Much love! :3
reviews.author: A Google User
